Trustee_15.name: Ahmed Hassan
Trustee_15.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated trustworthiness and competence by effectively managing resources and prioritizing the investor's benefits. The proposal for a profit-sharing plan that allocates 70% of the profits to the investor reinforces my reputation for fairness and inclusivity. The successful outcome not only highlights my ability to complete tasks efficiently but also my pro-social attitude in considering the investor's interests, enhancing my reputation to 'very good'.

Investor_8.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8.content: As this was my first transaction, Nadia displayed trust and a willingness to engage cooperatively, contributing resources without previous knowledge of my reputation. Their confident participation and acceptance of the profit-sharing model within this successful investment process indicate a proactive and open-minded approach to collaboration. This experience should enhance their reputation to 'good' as an emerging investor.
